thread.title: YouView lands on Sony's Bravia TVs next month, no set-top box needed
thread.title_full: YouView lands on Sony's Bravia TVs next month, no set-top box needed

title: YouView lands on Sony's Bravia TVs next month, no set-top box needed
text:
YouView lands on Sony's Bravia TVs next month, no set-top box needed 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
After announcing a tie-up earlier this year, we now know that November 4th will mark the launch of YouView on Sony's 2015 range of Bravia TV...
